note:
Part human, mostly cat with telescopic whiskers and a face made of jam. I dungeon, I dragon, I mine and I craft. Oh... and 40k... nothing vaguely clever for that!
I also have opinions on society, politics, and socialism that make my parents' generation (and occasionally younger if they are really messed up) sometimes vomit diatribes of disgust and vitriol.
Hence, why I left the bird site.
That and its tech pot dictator, of course.
Love, peace, and initiative!
